summary: Update an existing website by referencing https://buildcraft.co.in/ for the desired changes.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Construction company horizontal logo, bold industrial style (buildcraft-logo-horizontal.dim_512x128.png)
- Construction company square icon logo, simplified mark (buildcraft-logo-icon.dim_256x256.png)
- Construction company social sharing banner with logo and subtle texture (buildcraft-logo-social.dim_512x256.png)
- Construction hero background photo/illustration of modern building site with warm light and subtle overlay-friendly composition (construction-hero-bg.dim_2400x1350.jpg)
- Subtle construction texture background (concrete/blueprint/steel pattern), low-contrast (construction-section-texture.dim_2400x1200.png)
- About section image showing professional construction team on-site (construction-about-team.dim_1600x900.jpg)
- Contact section image showing tools/blueprints/architecture desk scene (construction-contact-support.dim_1600x900.jpg)

existing_features.title: Review https://buildcraft.co.in/ and update the current site’s public-facing pages to closely match the reference website’s information architecture (section order, section presence, navigation labels/anchors) and overall layout, while keeping the existing single-page section-scroll structure where feasible.

Align all user-facing marketing content (company name, hero messaging, about text, services, projects, testimonials, contact copy) with the content presented on https://buildcraft.co.in/ and ensure all user-facing text is in English.

Ensure the site uses the specified construction-themed static image assets (logos and section imagery) from frontend/public/assets/generated and that all existing references (header, footer, hero, about, contact, SEO/social image) correctly point to these files.

Verify and update SEO-facing metadata to align with https://buildcraft.co.in/ branding (title/description/OG where applicable) while preserving existing search console verification files, robots.txt, sitemap.xml, and manifest functionality.

new_feature_requests.summary: Review https://buildcraft.co.in/ and update the current site accordingly (design/content/features alignment).

Update brand styling to visually align with https://buildcraft.co.in/ (construction/industrial feel), applying consistent typography, spacing, button styles, card styles, and section backgrounds across the site using Tailwind/global styles and section/component composition (do not edit immutable UI component sources).

Keep the existing inquiry submission flow functional end-to-end: the Contact form must submit name, email, phone, selected service type, and message to the Motoko backend and show clear success/error states in English.
Maintain admin-restricted inquiry management behavior: only admins can fetch all inquiries and inquiry count; public users/guests can submit inquiries without authentication.
